creator: Hotels, Last Minute Deals, Flights & Vacation
descriptionHtml:
Do you love cheap holidays? We specially select last minute flights and awesome holiday deals including hotels, city breaks, low cost holidays and cruises! All the best travel deals in one app - for free!

We have the best holiday deals for every kind of trip. From cheap flights (including last minute flights), cheap hotels, city breaks (with or without flight tickets), cruises and fantastic cheap holiday packages.

Looking for last minute holiday deals? Then check out our great holiday deals. Or, if you prefer to book your holiday well in advance, we have lots of early bird options for that too. Want to know about cheap hotels near me? We can show you the best value hotels right where you are or a bit further away if you are looking for a weekend break.

What kind of vacation or getaway offers can you expect?
£ 34 - Great Value: Cheap Tickets to Majorca
£ 145 - Luxury Weekend in Paris incl. Flight Tickets & 4* Hotel
£ 119 - Weekend Trip to Berlin incl. Flight Tickets & 4* Hotel
£ 10 - Bargain Trip to Oslo

Our deals always represent great value, as we check the reviews for all of the places we recommend on TripAdvisor, Trivago, Booking.com and many more. Nothing below par slips through our net – ensuring even our cheapest holiday deals will still be of the highest quality.

Every day we find the best vacation offers for all over the world – from France and Spain to the Caribbean, the United States and Asia.

So let's explain how we find these great last minute hotel deals and flight offers.

Let’s say you're looking for cheap tickets:
We check all major websites several times a day: Expedia, Skyscanner, Momondo, Booking.com, Hotwire and many more. They also tell us when they have special sales of cheap tickets. Our editors double-check all the cheap flight tickets (incl. error fares) to ensure they really are a great offer and if, for example, the cheapest flights are still available.

Hotel Deals
The process of finding cheap hotels near me or cheap hotel deals is similar to the way we find the cheapest flights. We don't just look at the travel search engines like Trivago and Momondo but also hotel websites like Booking.com, Hotwire and more. We then handpick their best offers for our last minute hotel deals. Again, the reviews on TripAdvisor, Trivago or Agoda are really important to us here. You will find last minute hotel deals for all major cities in Europe or you can just check what cheap hotels are near me. You can also see what last minute flights or low cost holidays are departing from airports nearby. Just check out our travel app.

City trips
What’s better than a city break in places such as New York, Paris or Barcelona? We search for the cheapest flights and the cheapest hotel deals and combine these to make the best value holiday deals for you. We also add theme parks or other attractions to some deals. Furthermore, we check vacation websites to see if they already have great offers for city breaks that include cheap tickets and a hotel.

Package holidays & cruises
All inclusive package holidays and cruises are some of the best ways to relax and truly enjoy travelling. We find perfect all inclusive resorts in popular destinations such as Ibiza, Majorca, Sardinia or the Canary Islands. These kinds of low cost holidays mostly come from tour operators and cruise operators, which we regularly check out. We also create awesome cruise deals by combining cruises with one of our cheap flight deals.

Please consider:
We are not travel agents at TravelDeals24. We are independent editors who search through all major and minor vacation sites for cheap tickets etc. This allows us to give you a truly unbiased overview of holiday deals, no matter what airline or website has them for sale.

This also means that you never book your cheap tickets, hotels, an all inclusive vacation or cruises on our app. The actual booking always takes place on the website where we find the deal, like Secret Escapes, Trivago, Expedia or Kayak etc.
descriptionShort: Specially selected low cost holidays, last minute flights, cruises & city breaks

appDetails.developerAddress:
Hotels, Last Minute Deals, Flights & Vacation by TravelDeals24
c/o Traveldeals24 Inc.
PO Box 1675
Lunenburg, Nova Scotia B0J 2C0
Canada
